name: Ann FELDMAN and Kim Manufacturing Company, Stewart Hall, L.P., Intervenors v. The BOARD OF SUPERVISORS OF EAST CALN TOWNSHIP, Progressive Housing Ventures, LLC, J. Loew and Associates, Inc., and Borough Council of the Borough of Downingtown. Petition of: Ann Feldman

parties: Ann FELDMAN and Kim Manufacturing Company, Stewart Hall, L.P., Intervenors v. The BOARD OF SUPERVISORS OF EAST CALN TOWNSHIP, Progressive Housing Ventures, LLC, J. Loew and Associates, Inc., and Borough Council of the Borough of Downingtown Petition of: Ann Feldman

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 27th day of September, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
158 A.3d 79
Ann FELDMAN and Kim Manufacturing Company, Stewart Hall, L.P., Intervenors v. The BOARD OF SUPERVISORS OF EAST CALN TOWNSHIP, Progressive Housing Ventures, LLC, J. Loew and Associates, Inc., and Borough Council of the Borough of Downingtown Petition of: Ann Feldman
No. 307 MAL 2016
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
September 27, 2016
